depositERC20Tokens(address,address,uint2.details: The caller must allow the portal to withdraw at least      `_amount` tokens from their account beforehand.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred

depositERC20Tokens(address,address,uint2.notice: Transfer ERC-20 tokens to a DApp and add an input to         the DApp's input box to signal such operation.
